topics.body:
I will say this; I may not watch jojo, *BUT* I do appreciate that it's not a rehashed style of story.

What I mean by this is that one of the biggest things I have against shonen is that they tend to be extremely formulaic to the point it's like a "guess who" game.  Most shonen tend to be plucky slightly dumb and naive hero who refuses to kill anyone + the yandere fighting against the evil villain who is "smart" but in reality is incredibly stupid + the angsty ex-friend who looks like his nails done in a salon.


Most shonen you know that the hero isn't going to kill the villain and that in all likelihood the villain dying is going to be a massive asspull of "the hero didn't kill him; the villain just had this medical condition/physical weakness that caused his death that we never spoke about beforehand and thus the hero is still a good person".


Jojo on the other hand from what I've heard you don't know if the crew is going to fucking kill the bad guy or not; jojo is in the same vain as "you're already dead".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559db46263687254d00005e5#post_559db46263687254d00005e5
Jojo is fond of "A fate worse than death" for their main villains.

[spoiler]Kars was launched into space where he instantly froze and drifted through space forever. Diavolo was locked in a loop of him dying in different ways for all eternity.[/spoiler]

But eh you don't have to if you don't want to. Just offering for whenever.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559db46263687254d00005e5#post_559db46263687254d00005e5
I'll say this as a Shonen fan, some Shonen can be a little *too* idealistic. For instance, in Naruto, there seems to be this obsession with redeemable villains. It's not a bad idea, except that they kinda sweep the villain's actions under the rug. Damn near every villain is fucking redeemable. Say what you want about Dragon Ball, but at least they treated the villains there like actual villains.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

I know what you mean though, they kill the shit out of some people with no qualms at all
